name: Expense/Income (Instrument)
notes: Book income or expense for instruments in the system
display_expr: 'Income/Expense: '+str(selector_purpose)+', Instrument: '+transactions[0].instrument.short_name+', Amount: '+format_number(transactions[0].cash_consideration, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' '+transactions[0].settlement_currency.user_code+' in '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code

actions.condition_expr: ((selector_purpose=='Coupon' or selector_purpose=='Dividend') and (reverse=='-')) or ((selector_purpose=='Management fee' or selector_purpose=='Performance fee' or selector_purpose=='Depository Receipt fee') and (reverse=='Reverse'))

((selector_purpose=='Coupon' or selector_purpose=='Dividend') and (reverse=='Reverse')) or ((selector_purpose=='Management fee' or selector_purpose=='Performance fee' or selector_purpose=='Depository Receipt fee') and (reverse=='-'))
